metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32293 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In ConnMan through 1.41, a man-in-the-middle attack against a WISPR HTTPquery could be used to trigger a use-after-free in WISPR handling, leadingto crashes or code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32293` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

connman - 1.36-2.3ubuntu0.1
connman-vpn - 1.36-2.3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: connman package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.36-2.3ubuntu0.1').
